metadata.title: CVE-2024-6388 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Marco Trevisan discovered that the Ubuntu Advantage Desktop Daemon, beforeversion 1.12, leaks the Pro token to unprivileged users by passing thetoken as an argument in plaintext.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-6388` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ubuntu-advantage-desktop-daemon - 1.10.ubuntu0.18.04.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: ubuntu-advantage-desktop-daemon package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.10.ubuntu0.18.04.1~esm1').
